-50,200,400,300,40,1;  400,300,80,400,30,-1;  80,400,530,500,40,1;;;

-50,300,200,400,100,1;  200,400,-50,500,100,1;;;

-50,150,240,220,30,1;  240,220,80,270,40,-1;  80,270,220,320,40,1;  220,320,100,345,20,-1;  100,345,-50,320,15,-1;;;
240,-50,240,250,30,0;  240,250,260,250,15,1;  260,250,300,290,15,1;  300,290,300,330,15,0;  300,330,260,370,15,-1;  260,370,220,370,15,-1;  220,370,180,330,15,-1;  180,330,180,290,15,0;  180,290,220,250,15,1;  220,250,260,250,15,1;      260,250,300,290,15,1;  300,290,300,330,15,0;  300,330,260,370,15,-1;  260,370,220,370,15,-1;  220,370,180,330,15,-1;  180,330,180,290,15,0;  180,290,220,250,15,1;  220,250,260,250,15,1;      260,250,300,290,15,1;  300,290,300,330,15,0;  300,330,260,370,15,-1;  260,370,220,370,15,-1;  220,370,180,330,15,-1;  180,330,180,290,15,0;  180,290,220,250,15,1;  220,250,260,250,15,1;      260,250,300,290,15,1;  300,290,300,330,15,0;  300,330,260,370,15,-1;  260,370,220,370,15,-1;  220,370,180,330,15,-1;  180,330,180,290,15,0;  180,290,220,250,15,1;  220,250,240,250,15,1;      240,250,240,-50,30,0;;;
100,0,20,50,10,-1;  20,50,100,100,10,1;  100,100,20,150,10,-1;  20,150,100,200,10,1;  100,200,20,250,10,-1;  20,250,100,300,10,1;  100,300,20,350,10,-1;  20,350,100,400,10,1;  100,400,20,450,10,-1;  20,450,100,500,10,1;  100,500,20,550,10,-1;  20,550,100,600,10,1;  100,600,20,650,10,-1;  20,650,100,700,10,1;  100,700,20,750,10,-1;  20,750,100,800,10,1;  100,800,20,850,10,-1;;;

//  <-- Trennzeichen für den Code

Weg der Gegner
x_start, y_start, x_end, y_end, Frames, ModelArt [-1 = left] [0 = normal] [1 = right]

Es wird immer der komplette Weg in ein Listenelement geladen und dann komplett abgefragt
